title: Becoming: The Life & Musings of a Girl Poet
description: Becoming is a rousing composition of poems about utilizing your God-given talents and gifts in such a way that leads to a life of fulfillment. After searching, comes knowing â€” Becoming: The Life & Musings of a Girl Poet is a small collection of inspirational poems and articles and is the follow-up to the award-winning book Unscrambled Eggs. http://www.nadiajanicebrown.com
author: Nadia Janice Brown
